thread.section_title: etrailer Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of etrailer | etrailer.com
thread.title: Ken

author: Ken
title: Ken
text:
Adam's recommendations per my request was spot on. Although I had follow-on questions, he stayed the course until I completely grasped what he was trying to relay.
However, and on the other hand, and this is has nothing to do with Adam I might add; after placing my order (per Adam's recommendation) with sales the same day, it wasn't until the following day I received a call that the parts were not on hand. Would have been nice to know this before placing the order. I did find the items at another on line vendor however, so all is good and I will have the hitch installed in time for my trip.
Again, Adam was magnificent!
